name: angular-template
description: A starter template for Angular projects with ESLint, Prettier, and custom scripts.
author: Jagoda11

scripts.start: echo 'ğŸš€ Starting development server...' && ng serve
scripts.watch: echo 'ğŸ‘€ Watching for changes...' && ng build --watch --configuration development
scripts.test: echo 'ğŸ§ª Running tests with coverage...' && ng test --watch=false --browsers=ChromeHeadless --code-coverage
scripts.lint-fix: echo 'ğŸ”§ Linting and fixing issues...' && eslint --fix . && prettier --write .
scripts.format: echo 'âœ¨ Formatting code with Prettier...' && prettier --write .
scripts.clean: echo 'ğŸ§½ Cleaning up...' && rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist && rm package-lock.json
scripts.docker-clean: echo 'ğŸ§¹ Cleaning up Docker resources...' && docker stop $(docker ps -aq) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) && docker image prune -af && docker volume prune -f && docker network prune -f && docker builder prune -f
scripts.postinstall: if [ "$DOCKER" = "true" ]; then npm install typescript@5.5.4 --legacy-peer-deps; fi
scripts.generate-tests: echo 'ğŸ› ï¸ Generating missing test files... ğŸ“‚' && node scripts/generate-tests.js && echo 'âœ… Test generation complete! ğŸ‰'
scripts.generate-docs: echo 'ğŸ“š Generating documentation... âœï¸' && compodoc -p tsconfig.app.json -d documentation && echo 'âœ… Documentation generation complete! ğŸ‰'
